catalyst: TiO2 and Mo-doped TiO2 are used as the photocatalyst in the experiment.
co_catalyst: Sodium carbonate solution was used to simulate the liquid-solid CO2 reduction system, acting as a co-catalyst in the experiment.
operation mode: The experiment was conducted in a vacuum reactor with a 300 W Xe lamp, maintaining the process at 298 K. CO2 (20 ml) and H2O (20 l) were injected prior to light irradiation, and products were monitored at 60-minute intervals using gas chromatography.
